name: Network Speed Tester Client
description: Use Network Speed Tester Client to measure the actual transfer speed of your WiFi network. A graph helps you see changes in realtime.  Please note: to use this app you need to have a Network Speed Tester Server running on the same network.  Example Uses - Find bottlenecks in your wireless network - Optimise the placement of your wifi router, try different locations until you get the best network performance - Measure impact of wifi range extenders - Find the best spot for watching streaming movies in your home  Features Overview - Accurate performance measuring of your network using client-server technology - Get actual realworld network throughput - Graphical visualization - Find local test servers automatically
